1·le MONUMENTA DE INSULA MANNIAE.

JOHN BRADSHAWE TO COLONEL DUCKENFIELD.

A.D. 1651.

STATE PAPER Omen.

R,—The bearer John Christian, being a native of thais island, bath informed us of diverse thing-s of good concernment to the State, Whereof he can also give you notice. WVee desire you to receive his informatione, and make such use of them on the States behalfe as you shall see cause. Signed, See„ J o. Bradshawe. Whitehall, 23 Deeemb., 1051.
